SEARCH
Package source.Database

Class EnquiryDaoImpl

java.lang.Object
source.Database.BaseDaoImpl
source.Database.EnquiryDaoImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
EnquiryDao
public class EnquiryDaoImpl extends BaseDaoImpl implements EnquiryDao
The EnquiryDaoImpl implements the functions of EnquiryDao using the DAO Design Pattern.
Since:
11/4/2023
Author:
Isaac Chun

  • Method Details

    • readFile

      protected void readFile(String filePath)
      Reads a file and deserializes it using the Enquiry deserializer. Updates the staff list stored in this class.
      Overrides:
      readFile in class BaseDaoImpl
      Parameters:
      filePath - the path to the file for reading
      See Also:
      • EnquiryDeserializer

    • readEnquiry

      public Enquiry readEnquiry(DatabaseQuery query)
      Searches the database to see if the Enquiry name exists (it is assumed that Enquiry names are unique according to the FAQ).
      Specified by:
      readEnquiry in interface EnquiryDao
      Parameters:
      query - the database query object
      Returns:
      the Enquiry object associated with that Enquiry name, null if there is no found entry.

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      the enquiry object if found

    • readEnquiries

      public ArrayList<Enquiry> readEnquiries(DatabaseQuery query)
      Reads all enquiries that satisfies a particular property. NOTE: List can be empty if no results are found
      Specified by:
      readEnquiries in interface EnquiryDao
      Parameters:
      query - query to check in our header
      Returns:
      an arraylist of enquiries if found, an empty list if not.

    • updateEnquiry

      public boolean updateEnquiry(Enquiry enquiry)

      enquiry - the enquiry to update
      Returns:
